q_en: What are the raw materials with non zero inventory in all of our warehouses, organized in the form of 'Type: Remaining Quantity'?
gt:
Sure thing! Here are the raw materials with non-zero inventory in all of our warehouses, organized in a neat table for you:

| Type              | Remaining Quantity |
|-------------------|--------------------|
| Cotton Fabric     | 3500               |
| Wool              | 4100               |
| Silk              | 1100               |
| Leather           | 2200               |
| Synthetic Fiber   | 2300               |
| Denim Fabric      | 4500               |
| Down              | 1230               |
| Down Pieces       | 2420               |

I hope this helps! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. ðŸ˜Š

steps.sql: SELECT m.id, m.name, SUM(wm.left_number) as remaining_quantity FROM materials m JOIN warehouse_material wm ON m.id = wm.material_id WHERE m.type = 'origin' AND wm.left_number > 0 GROUP BY m.id, m.name;
steps.description: Retrieve the material IDs and names for raw materials with non-zero inventory in all warehouses
